changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO countries (code, name) SELECT COALESCE(NULLIF(country_code_iso3166_1_alpha_2, 'nullable'), NULLIF(iso3166_1_alpha2, 'nullable')) AS country_code, COALESCE(NULLIF(name_ru, 'nullable'), NULLIF(official_name_ru, 'nullable'), NULLIF(name_en, 'nullable'), NULLIF(official_name_en, 'nullable')) AS country_name FROM countries_temp WHERE COALESCE(NULLIF(country_code_iso3166_1_alpha_2, 'nullable'), NULLIF(iso3166_1_alpha2, 'nullable')) IS NOT NULL AND COALESCE(NULLIF(name_ru, 'nullable'), NULLIF(official_name_ru, 'nullable'), NULLIF(name_en, 'nullable'), NULLIF(official_name_en, 'nullable')) IS NOT NULL ON CONFLICT (name) DO NOTHING;

changeSet.author: pavbatol
changeSet.sql: MERGE INTO countries AS target USING ( SELECT COALESCE(NULLIF(country_code_iso3166_1_alpha_2, 'nullable'), NULLIF(iso3166_1_alpha2, 'nullable')) AS country_code, COALESCE(NULLIF(name_ru, 'nullable'), NULLIF(official_name_ru, 'nullable'), NULLIF(name_en, 'nullable'), NULLIF(official_name_en, 'nullable')) AS country_name FROM countries_temp WHERE COALESCE(NULLIF(country_code_iso3166_1_alpha_2, 'nullable'), NULLIF(iso3166_1_alpha2, 'nullable')) IS NOT NULL AND COALESCE(NULLIF(name_ru, 'nullable'), NULLIF(official_name_ru, 'nullable'), NULLIF(name_en, 'nullable'), NULLIF(official_name_en, 'nullable')) IS NOT NULL ) AS source ON target.name = source.country_name WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (code, name) VALUES (source.country_code, source.country_name)
